languages.text: {n}Священник измеряет вас тяжелым взором, а затем взрывается хохотом. Хриплый голос его звенит так, будто натянутые голосовые связки вот-вот лопнут.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Священник измеряет вас тяжелым взором, а затем взрывается хохотом. Хриплый голос его звенит так, будто натянутые голосовые связки вот-вот лопнут.{/n}

languages.text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Священник измеряет вас тяжелым взором, а затем взрывается хохотом. Хриплый голос его звенит так, будто натянутые голосовые связки вот-вот лопнут.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter. His hoarse voice sounds like his strained vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}
{n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter. His hoarse voice sounds like his strained vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}
{n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}
{n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}
{n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

languages.text: {n}他用沉重的目光打量着你，之后爆发出一阵大笑。他的声音是如此嘶哑，你甚至担心他的声带要被震断了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他用沉重的目光打量着你，之后爆发出一阵大笑。他的声音是如此嘶哑，你甚至担心他的声带要被震断了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te analiza intensamente, y después se echa a reír. Su voz suena tan bronca que crees que sus cuerdas vocales se van a romper.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te analiza intensamente, y después se echa a reír. Su voz suena tan bronca que crees que sus cuerdas vocales se van a romper.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼は重々しい眼差しでこちらを見つめ、大笑いした。あまりに声を荒げるため、彼の声帯が切れるのではないかと心配になるほどだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は重々しい眼差しでこちらを見つめ、大笑いした。あまりに声を荒げるため、彼の声帯が切れるのではないかと心配になるほどだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er mustert dich mit seinem schweren Blick und bricht dann in Gelächter aus, so heiser, dass du fürchtest, seine Stimmbänder könnten reißen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er mustert dich mit seinem schweren Blick und bricht dann in Gelächter aus, so heiser, dass du fürchtest, seine Stimmbänder könnten reißen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous scrute d'un regard lourd, avant d'éclater d'un rire si rauque que ses cordes vocales semblent sur le point de lâcher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous scrute d'un regard lourd, avant d'éclater d'un rire si rauque que ses cordes vocales semblent sur le point de lâcher.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Seni ağır bakışlarla süzüyor, ardından bir kahkaha krizine tutuluyor. Sesi o kadar çatlak çıkıyor ki ses tellerinin yırtılacağından endişe ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He studies you with his heavy gaze, then erupts into a fit of laughter, his voice so hoarse, you fear his vocal cords are about to snap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seni ağır bakışlarla süzüyor, ardından bir kahkaha krizine tutuluyor. Sesi o kadar çatallı ki ses tellerinin yırtılacağından endişe ediyorsun.{/n}
